property.name: name
property.hint: Sets the name of control.

property.name: value
property.hint: Sets the value of the control.

property.name: width
property.hint: Sets width of the control.

property.name: height
property.hint: set height of the control.

property.name: title
property.hint: Sets title of control.

property.name: indexed
property.hint: Sets whether the object generates index.

property.name: size
property.hint: Sets size for the control's content.

property.name: tabindex
property.hint: Sets the index that defines the tab order for the object.

property.name: accesskey
property.hint: Sets the accelerator key for the object.

property.name: modelField
property.hint: Binding a field of ViewModel.

property.name: maxlength
property.hint: Sets the maximum number of characters that the user can enter in a text control.

property.name: onSelectFunc
property.hint: Fires on the row has been seleted.

property.name: beforeSelectFunc
property.hint: Fires beofore the row has been seleted.

property.name: afterSelectFunc
property.hint: Fires after the row has been seleted.

property.name: beforeUnSelectFunc
property.hint: Fires before the row has been unseleted.

property.name: afterUnSelectFunc
property.hint: Fires after the row has been unseleted.

property.name: onRefreshFunc
property.hint: Fires on the row has been refreshed.

property.name: onClickFunc
property.hint: Fires when the user clicks the object.

property.name: onUnSelectFunc
property.hint: Fires on the row has been unseleted.

property.name: onmouseover
property.hint: Fires when the user moves the mouse pointer into the object.

property.name: onmouseout
property.hint: Fires when the user moves the mouse pointer outside the boundaries of the object.

property.name: onmouseup
property.hint: Fires when the user releases a key.

property.name: onmousemove
property.hint: Fires when the user moves the mouse over the object.

property.name: ondblclick
property.hint: Fires when the user double-clicks the object.

property.name: onclick
property.hint: Fires when the user clicks the object.

property.name: onmousedown
property.hint: Fires when the user clicks the object with either mouse button.

property.name: onchange
property.hint: Fires when the contents of the object or selection have changed.

property.name: onkeyup
property.hint: Fires when the user releases a key.

property.name: onkeypress
property.hint: Fires when the user presses an alphanumeric key.

property.name: onblur
property.hint: Fires when the object loses the input focus.

property.name: onkeydown
property.hint: Fires when the user presses a key.

property.name: onfocus
property.hint: Fires when the object receives focus.

property.name: onselect
property.hint: Fires when the current selection changes.

property.name: icon
property.hint: Sets icon of control.
